Type Method# value(_:_:unit:calendar:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+watchOS 11.0+

```
static func value(
    _ label: Text,
    _ date: DataValue,
    unit: Calendar.Component,
    calendar: Calendar? = nil
) -> PlottableProjection<DataElement, DataValue>
```

Available when `DataValue` is `Date`.
